features.title: Smart tools designed to simplify your financial life.

block1.heading: Direct Investing
block1.text: Start new investments directly from the app, whether in stocks, mutual funds, or others.

block2.heading: Effortlessly track your finances
block2.text: Track your net worth and assets in real time with intuitive charts and clear breakdowns that keep you informed.

block3.heading: Simplified Budget Management
block3.text: Easily set and monitor your budgets for different categories. Get helpful reminders and insights to stay on track.

security.heading: Your bank accounts and investments are always secure.
security.text: Mizan uses advanced encryption and trusted connections to keep your accounts and investments safe — always.
